name: Fajoce
description: Step-by-step game in which you have to kill the enemy team before he kills you. In each round, you have a certain amount of time to shoot one of the weapons, or skip the turn.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: with 1024 MB VRAM compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 80 MB available space Sound Card: DirectXÂ® Compatible
